title: Update profile picture from LinkedIn URL

requirements.text: Download the image at https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8u1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk and save it as the profile photo static asset, then update HeroSection.tsx to use this new image as the profile picture, replacing any previously set profile photo.

quotes: add this image as profile pic

acceptanceCriteria: The new LinkedIn photo is saved as a local static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/
HeroSection.tsx references the new local asset as the profile picture src
The profile photo displayed in the hero section matches the provided LinkedIn image

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Profile image must be served as a local static asset, not fetched at runtime from the external LinkedIn URL
nonGoals: Changes to any other CV sections or data

required: Professional headshot portrait photo of a young man, warm-toned background, business casual attire (profile-photo.dim_400x400.png)
